amendment.description: To require the FTC to report to the Congress on its efforts to improve the accuracy of the Do-Not-Call Registry.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3867 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3867 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Dorgan. To require the FTC to report to the Congress on its efforts to improve the accuracy of the Do-Not-Call Registry.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3867 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3867 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
